attributes.action: please intervene to stop Adam K from being so freekin corporate!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every morning it's; 'Don't forget to talk about the weather', 'Remember to do the time checks', 'Do you really have to talk about willies?', 'No Charlie don't do that, do this... I worked with Steve Penk y'know?'... etc etc etc... ad freekin nauseum... It gets to a point where the country must do something or it will never change. This is SO unfair on the million listeners but forget them    WHAT ABOUT CHARLIE AND ROBIN??? They have to put up with this and in some cases (ok I lie IN ALL CASES!!) actually agree with him for their sanity. PLease I implore, I beg of you... SIGN THE PETITION... OR NEXT TIME HE COULD BE OVERSEEING YOU!!!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
